title: Marcel Gebhardt
text: Marcel Gebhardt (born 15 September 1979) is a German former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He made his debut on the professional league level in the <a href="2.%20Bundesliga">2. Bundesliga</a> for <a href="1.%20FC%20K%C3%B6ln">1. FC Köln</a> on 1 October 1999 when he came on as a substitute for <a href="Dirk%20Lottner">Dirk Lottner</a> in the 73rd minute in a game against <a href="SV%20Waldhof%20Mannheim">SV Waldhof Mannheim</a>.
